Question: This person and Linda Thompson split in November, and he took up with a new girlfriend, Ginger Alden.
Hints: Shortly before Christmas 1966, more than seven years since they first met, this person proposed to Priscilla Beaulieu.
In any event, as critic Greil Marcus describes, this person "did not tie himself down.
In September 1941, this person entered first grade at East Tupelo Consolidated, where his instructors regarded him as "average".
